tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_scheduler (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_trigger VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    scheduled_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    behavior_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  name VARCHAR(255),
  last_activity TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE behavior_triggers (
  trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_name VARCHAR(255),
  trigger_description TEXT,
  trigger_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE email_templates (
  template_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  template_name VARCHAR(255),
  template_subject VARCHAR(255),
  template_body TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE scheduled_emails (
  email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  template_id INT,
  scheduled_time TIMESTAMP
)
